description: Simple, professional and user-centered design is my specialty
video_not_supported: Your browser does not support the video

content: I am Alireza, a software engineer specializing in Python. I have extensive experience in developing application software, data processing, and designing networked systems with Python, and I am interested in optimizing and implementing Python in various projects. In addition to being fully proficient in Python, I am skilled in web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and I work in designing modern user interfaces and building interactive websites. Also, I have been working on various projects with ReactJs for more than a year, and I have gained valuable experience in developing dynamic and scalable web applications.

Learning and applying new technologies in the world of software development is one of my constant goals. In addition, with more than three years of experience in developing and optimizing WordPress websites, I have special abilities in designing, personalizing, and managing WordPress sites. In my professional path, I am always looking to learn, improve my skills, and achieve new challenges.

items.title: Senior Frontend Developer - Tech Company
items.description: Leading the frontend team in developing enterprise applications with React and TypeScript. Designing and implementing the company's design system.

items.title: Frontend Developer - Digi Startup
items.description: Developed e-commerce platform UI using React and Redux. Optimized performance and user experience.

Desktop_App1.title: MOTHER BOX LABEL PRINTING
Desktop_App1.description: Label printing system for mother boxes, with high accuracy and speed for industrial production lines.

Desktop_App2.title: Modem update tool
Desktop_App2.description: A tool for automatically updating modems in production lines with a simple user interface and fast performance.

Desktop_App3.title: Modem Testing & Diagnostic Tool
Desktop_App3.description: A tool for testing internet connection, speed, ping, Wi-Fi performance, and inspecting modem settings for DSL, fiber optic, and 4G/5G in production and quality control environments.

Desktop_App4.title: School management software
Desktop_App4.description: This software is designed for the comprehensive management of a technical high school, including features such as student attendance tracking, grade management, staff administration, and other operational activities.

Excel1.title: Dynamic Software with Excel
Excel1.description: A smart Excel tool for quick product pricing using live exchange rates and custom macros.

html_project.title: HTML Project
html_project.description: Simple HTML5 project for service presentation.

shopping_website.title: Shopping Website Project
shopping_website.description: A responsive shopping website with a professional user experience that allows users to browse products, add them to the cart, place orders, and manage their accounts.

barber_shop.title: Barber Shop Website
barber_shop.description: A minimal and responsive website for showcasing services, booking appointments, and displaying barber shop portfolios.

2048_Game.title: 2048 Game
2048_Game.description: A simple and engaging version of the 2048 game with responsive design, playable in the browser and great for practicing logic and math.

Hangman.title: Image-based Word Guessing Game
Hangman.description: A simple game where users guess the correct word based on an image. Designed to enhance vocabulary and reasoning skills in non-English languages.

Tetris.title: Web-based Tetris Game
Tetris.description: A smooth and minimal version of the classic Tetris game designed for desktop browsers. Mobile support is limited.
